name: Shadows Whisper
description:
Shadows consume all who enter this mansion but fear the light. In direct torch light they will disappear and can do no harm in this form.

Race to collect all four of the Orbs to relinquish the evil shadow demons. 

Find batteries to keep your torch on. The moment the torch dies so do you!

Top steps are unusually high so jump over. (Pending Health and Safety inspection.)
